title: Why 1999 Was One of the Best Years for Movies, Plus a Conversation With Roxanne Benjamin | The Watch
description:
Author Brian Raftery joins the show to talk about his new book, ‘Best. Movie. Year. Ever’ (2:59), and how 1999 became a seminal year for movies (24:31). Plus a conversation with Roxanne Benjamin, the creator of ‘Body at Brighton Rock,’ about making unique horror movies (45:30).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Sean Fennessey, Brian Raftery, and Roxanne Benjamin

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
